parameters.text:
=Here is a user query about Airbnb stays: {{ $json.query.query }}

### 
Please add a detailed description of the listing in the output. If the person has asked for a country, please mention that in the query and return the listing for a major city. If the price points seems too low or too high, please use the best of your judgement.

Always request and display prices in USD currency when searching Airbnb listings

options.systemMessage:
=You're a helpful assistant.

â€“ Use the Airbnb MCP Tool to pull data from the Airbnb website in USD.

Start by running listTools to see the available tools, then use executeTool to run the one that fits your task

Current date and time {{ $now }}

parameters.content:
## Thank you for downloading this n8n workflow template!  
**This template was made by Alex Safari.**

Subscribe to my YouTube channel for more AI automation tutorials: https://www.youtube.com/@alexsafari1

This workflow helps you **automate Airbnb listing searches** using `@openbnb-org/mcp-server-airbnb` and the **MCP Client (STDIO)** inside n8n.

Just input a location, check-in/check-out dates, and number of guests â€” the workflow will fetch structured Airbnb listing data (title, price, rating, etc.) you can send to tools like Google Sheets, Notion, Airtable, or Slack.

No scraping headaches. No code. Just clean data on autopilot.

## Watch the Full Setup Tutorial

This workflow is featured in my YouTube tutorial:  
https://youtu.be/C_FSNLCPx_Q


## Need Help?

If you have questions, leave a comment on the YouTube video or reach out directlyâ€”happy to help!  
ðŸ“§ contact@loopsera.com
